dc-workflow.title: E-Deposit ePeriodical Part Workflow
dc-workflow.description: A workflow for part of ePeriodical

state.title: Waiting for Aleph
state.description: Waiting till Aleph gets back SysNumber of an exported record

transition.title: Record has been changed
transition.action: Some changes appeared at the record.

transition.title: No record was loaded from Aleph
transition.action: No record was loaded from Aleph

transition.title: Load Summary Aleph Record by SysNumber

state.title: Choose a proper Aleph Record
state.description: An Acquisition administrator will choose a proper aleph record.

state.title: Prepare for Acquisition
state.description: An Acquisition administrator is preparing an ePublication for acquisition.

state.title: Prepare for Descriptive Cataloguing
state.description: A Descriptive Cataloguing administrator is preparing an ePublication for descriptive cataloguing.

state.title: Descriptive Cataloguing
state.description: A Descriptive Cataloguer is processing an ePublication for descriptive cataloguing.

state.title: Descriptive Cataloguing Review Preparing
state.description: A Descriptive Cataloguing Administrator prepares work for reviewers.

state.title: Closed - Descriptive Cataloguing Review Preparing
state.description: Closed - A Descriptive Cataloguing Administrator prepares work for reviewers.

state.title: Descriptive Cataloguing Review
state.description: A Descriptive Cataloguing Reviews controls an ePublication for descriptive cataloguing.

state.title: Closed - Descriptive Cataloguing Review
state.description: Closed - A Descriptive Cataloguing Reviews controls an ePublication for descriptive cataloguing.

state.title: Prepare for subject Cataloguing
state.description: A Subject Cataloguing administrator is preparing an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Closed - Prepare for subject Cataloguing
state.description: Closed - A Subject Cataloguing administrator is preparing an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Subject Cataloguing
state.description: A Subject Cataloguer is processing an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Closed - Subject Cataloguing
state.description: Closed - A Subject Cataloguer is processing an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Subject Cataloguing Review Preparing
state.description: A Subject Cataloguing Administrator prepares work for reviewers.

state.title: Closed - Subject Cataloguing Review Preparing
state.description: Closed - A Subject Cataloguing Administrator prepares work for reviewers.

state.title: Subject Cataloguing Review
state.description: A Subject Cataloguing Reviews controls an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Closed - Subject Cataloguing Review
state.description: Closed - A Subject Cataloguing Reviews controls an ePublication for subject cataloguing.

state.title: Acquisition
state.description: An ePublication is reviewed by Acquisitor.

transition.title: Export to Storage finished with error
transition.action: Export to Storage finished with error

transition.title: Export to Storage finished with success
transition.action: Export to Storage finished with success

transition.title: Export to Storage finished with success, skip LTP
transition.action: Export to Storage finished with success, skip LTP

transition.title: Export to LTP finished with error
transition.action: Export to LTP finished with error

transition.title: Export to LTP finished with success
transition.action: Export to LTP finished with success

transition.title: Export to Kramerius finished with error
transition.action: Export to Kramerius finished with error

transition.title: Export to Kramerius finished with success
transition.action: Export to Kramerius finished with success

state.title: Unknown error
state.description: An ePublication is reviewed by Acquisitor.

state.title: Record at Aleph was deleted
state.description: Waiting till Aleph gets back SysNumber of an exported record

state.title: Classification of an error
state.description: An error is classified now.

transition.title: Submit descriptive cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing review of descriptive cataloguing.

transition.title: Submit descriptive cataloguing review preparing
transition.description: We are doing review of descriptive cataloguing.

transition.title: Submit subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing review of subject cataloguing.

transition.title: Submit review of subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing export to Kramerius.

transition.title: Submit review of subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing export to Storage.

transition.title: Submit closed descriptive cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing review of descriptive cataloguing.

transition.title: Submit Closed descriptive cataloguing review preparing
transition.description: We are doing review of descriptive cataloguing.
transition.action: Submit Closed - Descriptive Cataloguing Review Preparing

transition.title: Submit closed subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing review of subject cataloguing.

transition.title: Submit closed - review of subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing export to Kramerius.
transition.action: Submit Closed - Subject Cataloguing Review Preparing

transition.title: Submit closed - review of subject cataloguing
transition.description: We are doing export to Kramerius.

transition.title: Export to Kramerius Passed with Error
transition.action: Export to Kramerius Passed with Error

transition.title: Export to Kramerius Passed with OK
transition.action: Export to Kramerius Passed with OK

transition.title: Validation for LTP Passed with OK
transition.action: Validation for LTP Passed with OK

transition.title: Link at Aleph has been accepted
transition.action: Link at Aleph has been accepted

transition.title: Link at Aleph has been rejected
transition.action: Link at Aleph has been rejected

variable.description: The ID of the user who performed the previous transition
When the previous transition was performed
